main.name: Raunel Suarez-Magana
main.bio: Full Stack Web developer, graduated from the University of Texas at Austin with a degree in Mathematics. Worked in education for four years. Recently earned a certificate from the UT coding bootcamp. Passionate about how software development can improve education and users' lives.
main.contactmessage: I would love to connect with you. Shoot me an email or add me on linkedin!

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of the programming languages I know. I still have a lot to learn, but I'm excited about improving!
